cast.overview: The boy Mowgli makes his way to the man-village with Bagheera, the wise panther. Along the way he meets jazzy King Louie, the hypnotic snake Kaa and the lovable, happy-go-lucky bear Baloo, who teaches Mowgli "The Bare Necessities" of life and the true meaning of friendship.
cast.title: The Jungle Book

details.biography: Bill Skiles was born on July 5, 1931 in San Antonio, Texas, USA. He was an actor, known for The John Davidson Show (1980), American Bandstand (1952) and The Mike Douglas Show (1961). He was previously married to Arlene Adams and Marilynn Lorraine Pierson. He died on May 16, 2011 in St. Cloud, Florida, USA.
details.name: Bill Skiles
